abstract: A recently released report highlights the spending patterns of public and private colleges and universities over the last decade.
snippet: A recently released report highlights the spending patterns of public and private colleges and universities over the last decade.
lead_paragraph: The Delta Project, an independent research organization focused on college affordability, released a report last month that charts trends in university spending from 1999 to 2009.

headline.main: Report Highlights Gap in Student Spending by Public and Private Colleges
